title: Indexhibit CMS2
description:
Description from official website:

Indexhibit - a user friendly Content Management System (CMS) to build and manage the content of your website, using the established format consisting of an index for navigating the site and an exhibit area for displaying your works.

Index + Exhibit = Indexhibit

Indexhibits aim is to establish and promote an archetypal format for the web, a straightforward and effective way to display content, combining good functionality and usability to foreground content over complicated website design. The more websites that use this structure, the more archetypal / invisible the structure becomes, and the more emphasis is placed on content.

Please invite your friends/colleagues/family to use Indexhibit.


- - -


You'll need at least PHP 4 and MySQL 3.23.


If you like it support the authors and buy this product! www.indexhibit.org


TLDR; Ultra minimalist CMS aimed at artists
